h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: First, look for a Blade Monk surrounded by frozen corpses, and note his blue glow. He's a lot more durable than the others, but by taking him on patiently and using your cooldowns, you'll be able to defeat him and gain the **Blade Monk Spirit**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
First, look for a Blade Monk surrounded by frozen corpses, and note his blue glow. He's a lot more durable than the others, but by taking him on patiently and using your cooldowns, you'll be able to defeat him and gain the **Blade Monk Spirit**.
